alert.note: Alert for Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 9:44AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Worcester County through 1030 AM EDT... At 944 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ocean City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Ocean City, Cape Isle Of Wight, Ocean Pines, West Ocean City, Ocean City Municipality and Bishopville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
